title: WhatsApp-Based Online Psychology Interactive Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of introductory psychology concepts and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: The need to strengthen collaborative learning using social media platforms in non-face-to-face educational settings post-COVID-19

learning_goals: Participate in discussions on psychology topics at least three times per week via WhatsApp group chat
Learners can submit two case studies applying psychology theories based on peer feedback and instructor guidance.
Learners can maintain positive interactions within groups (e.g., encouragement, questioning, complementary feedback) at or above 80%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
